attributes.action: Stop the merger of BAE Systems and EADs
attributes.additional_details: BAE Systems is our national defence manufacturer and a word leader in aerospace. It also makes profits from US and other exports. EADS  does not export to the US on such a large scale. EADS  is state subsidised by European Governments and is loss making. BAE Systems could lose exports in the US because of the new arrangements as the US is security conscious . BAE Systems have a preferably arrangement with the US at moment why put it at risk. It will also put Hi tech jobs at risk which are the future of the British economy as costs are cut.
